desc: Greenlife is a proud supplier of quality garden products. Raised Garden Beds, Metal and Plastic Garden Edging, Raised Garden Planters, Potting Benches, Greenhouses, Compost Bins, Herb Growers, Sprinklers, Tap Timers, Vertical Gardens, Growing Towers and Planters, Vegetable and Herb Seeds, Indoor Gardening and more.

layout.text: Grow Your Own Herbs and Vegetables
